alert.note: Alert for Bollinger; Cape Girardeau (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bollinger and west central Cape Girardeau Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 255 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marble Hill, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bollinger Mill State Historic Site and Burfordville around 310 PM CDT. Millersville around 315 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Missouri.
